participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and sociable, enjoys sharing interests with others.
participant_1.background: I love to go to the deli because I can get a sandwich that is both delicious and affordable. I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others. i live in pittsburgh. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger. My dad got a job transfer so we moved to a new town.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about storytelling, enjoys connecting with people through shared interests.
participant_2.background: I recently got to share my love of sports with a larger audience. I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good. I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind. I do not own a home, but I do enjoy traveling and sharing my experiences with the world. i read tons of books.

content.text: I love reading books. I have a massive collection and I love sharing my love of reading with others.
I love reading too, but I don't have a massive collection. I usually go to the library.
I love going to the library too, but I like having my own books so I can read them whenever I want.
Yeah, that's a good point. I wish I had a bigger collection.
Maybe you should start going to the used book store. You can find some great deals there.
That's a good idea. I'll have to check it out.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love historical fiction because it's so interesting to learn about the past.
Yeah, it's really cool to see how people lived in different time periods.
Do you have any favorite historical fiction books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should. It's a great series.
